Tristana.name: ºTristanaº
Tristana.title: ºøthe Megling Gunnerøº
Tristana.lore:
ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøThe Megling Commandos are something of a legend in Bandle City. They have a history that spans centuries, and they remain the oldest yordle military unit still in service. They are renowned for their courage, deadliness, and ruthlessness, making them the most respected and feared of all warriors in Bandle City. Legends of Megling, the valiant founder of the commandos, are still heard throughout Valoran's taverns. It was these legends that most fascinated a young Tristana. Since she was a wee child, Tristana wanted nothing more than to become the crack shot that her idol had been all those years ago. She trained her entire life, until finally she was old enough to join the military and able to earn her place among the Megling Commandos. The senior officers were impressed by her abilities, claiming that Tristana was a natural, and her dream was realized the day she donned her Megling fatigues.ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøº

ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøThough her heart lies with her unit, the call to the League of Legends was irresistible and now Tristana protects Bandle City as a champion. While intense and focused as a Megling Gunner, Tristana is remarkably different in her personal life. Outside the Fields of Justice, she is friendly and cheerful - the sort of yordle who always has a kind word for everyone. Tristana recently struck up a close friendship with Teemo, the Swift Scout. They are both members of Bandle City's Special Forces, so not only do they bond as yordles, but also as fellow warriors and champions... though she outright ignores any questions pertaining to a blossoming romance.ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøº

ºøºøºøºøºø''If there's one person I'd trust to take on a difficult mission, it's Tristana - all day long!''ºøºøºøºøº
º-- Teemoº
Tristana.blurb: ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøThe Megling Commandos are something of a legend in Bandle City. They have a history that spans centuries, and they remain the oldest yordle military unit still ...
allytips: ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøHer massive gun allows Tristana to fire on targets at a great distance. Utilize this to prevent your enemies from ever laying a hand on you.øºøºøºøºøºøºøº
ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøUse Rocket Jump to leap over an enemy and then use Buster Shot to send them flying back to your allies, but be careful about using this strategy in large team fights.ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøº
ºøºøºøºøºøºøºUsing the active ability on Explosive Shot can be useful early game to prevent the other team from healing or using health potions.ºøºøºøºøºøºøº
enemytips: ºøºøºøºøºøºIf you see Tristana activate Rapid Fire in a fight, stun her and try to back off until the spell dissipates.ºøºøºøºøºøº
ºøºøºøºøºStand away from your creeps in a lane to take less collateral damage from Explosive Shot.ºøºøºøºøº

spells.name: ºRapid Fireº
spells.description: ºøºøºøºøTristana fires her weapon rapidly, increasing her attack speed for a short time.øºøºøºøº
spells.tooltip: ºøºøIncreases Tristana's attack speed by ºøº{{ e1 }}ºø% for 7 seconds.º

spells.name: ºRocket Jumpº
spells.description: ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøTristana fires at the ground to propel herself to a distant location, dealing damage and slowing surrounding units for 3 seconds where she lands.ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøº
spells.tooltip:
ºøºøºøºøTristana fires at the ground to propel herself to target location, dealing ºøºøºøº{{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }})ºøºøºøºø magic damage and slowing surrounding units by 60% for 2.5 seconds when she lands.øºøºøºøº
ºøºøºøOn a champion kill or assist, Rocket Jump's cooldown resets.øºøºøº

spells.name: ºøExplosive Shotº
spells.description: ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºWhen Tristana kills a unit, her cannonballs burst into shrapnel, dealing damage to surrounding enemies.  Can be activated to deal damage to target unit over time, and reduce healing received.ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøºøº
spells.tooltip:
ºPassive: ººøºøºøEnemies explode when slain by Tristana's basic attacks, dealing ºøºøºøº{{ e1 }} (+{{ a2 }})ºøº magic damage to nearby enemies.ºøº

ºActive: ººøºøºøºøRends target enemy, reducing healing and health regeneration by 50% and dealing øºøºøºøº{{ e3 }} (+{{ a1 }})ºøº Magic Damage over 5 seconds.ºøº

spells.name: ºBuster Shotº
spells.description: ºøºøºøºøºøºøºøTristana loads a massive cannonball into her weapon and fires it at an enemy unit. This deals magic damage and knocks the target back.ºøºøºøºøºøºøº
spells.tooltip: ºøºøºøTristana fires a massive cannonball at an enemy unit. This deals ºøºøºøº{{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }})ºøºøº magic damage and knocks surrounding units back ºøºøº{{ e2 }}º distance.º

passive.name: ºDraw a Beadº
passive.description: ºøºøºIncreases Tristana's attack range as she levels.ºøºøº
